features: 【Bluetooth Calling & Smart Notifications】Free up your hands with the smart watch and make calls from your own wrist. With a built-in speaker and microphone, calls become easy to make, whether you're exercising outdoors or tidying up at home. Once connected to your phone, you can make, receive and reject calls and view call logs directly on the smart watch for women. Stay connected to SMS and APP messages(Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), never miss any important information.

【Activity Tracker & 100+ Sports Modes】Enjoy 100+ sports modes (walking, running, cycling, football...) with this fitness tracker. From indoor to outdoor activities, this activity tracker has it all. The fitness watch keeps an accurate record of your activities throughout the day and can track a variety of real-time data such as calories, distance, steps, etc. during your workout so you know your exercise status and make improvements accordingly, it is the perfect choice for fitness enthusiasts

【Health Monitor & Women Health Care】Smart watch for android phones with advanced sensors provide insights to help you better understand your health and make a reasonable adjustment on your lifestyle. Keep an eye on your health metrics (24-hour heart rate, blood oxygen and sleep), as well as record female menstrual periods, personalize menstrual management and pregnancy preparation reminders for women.

【Colorful Visuals & Customised Watch】The Best Combination of Style and Functionality. High-quality metal frame with 1.28-inch HD color display and 2.5D curved glass provides you with a more vivid and wider view. With the app connected, there are 150+ different beautiful dials to choose from. Also you can go for something totally unique with your own favorite pictures, such as your family, pets, idols. Whenever you raise your hand, the smart watch screen lights up to show off your personal style.

【Multifunctional Smartwatch & IP68 Waterproof 】Music controller, camera control, weather, automatic light up, breathing training, phone search, alarm clock, timer, stopwatch, etc. The smart watch with text and call is IP68 water resistant, whether you sweat or get splashed by a light drizzle, it can handle it all. The watch is compatible with iOS11.0+ and Android6.0+. Not suitable for PC or tablet.

【Best Gift & 24/7 After-sales Support】Show your style with a luxurious and timeless watch design that’s great for any occasion, a great gift to express love to your family and friends! Purchase with confidence, 1-year warranty promised by Gydom. We are striving to provide you with the best products and service, any questions please don't hesitate to tell us, our professional technical team is standing by within 24 hours!

Remote Control Photography After normal connection, open the "Remote Control Photo" and tap the watch screen to take photos for your convenience Standalone/Controlled Music The smartwatch has a built-in speaker to play music from the watch or to control music from the phone Dual-mode Bluetooth Minimises connection speed, latency and power consumption Enables you to make calls and also play music through your smart watch High Capacity Battery Can be fully charged in approximately 2 hours for 2~7 days of continuous use in normal use and up to 30 days in standby mode

How can I contact the seller if I encounter a problem while using the watch? 1-year free replacement & 24/7 After-sales Support How to find us quickly: Select "Your Order"---find the order ID---click "Contact Seller" Can this smart watch receive calls and dial numbers？ Yes! you can make, receive and reject calls and view call logs directly on the smart watch directly. Does this watch work with iPhone or Android phones? Yes, The watch is compatible with iOS11.0+ and Android6.0+ smartphones How to pair the watch with my phone? Turn on the Bluetooth of your phone>>scan the watch's QR code>>download the "OnWear Pro" APP>>follow the APP instructions to connect. Can you replace the band and if so what size? Yes you can with a 22mm size slide bar band

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional but tricky to use
reviews.reviewText: It’s a basic fitness watch, and works fine for heart rate, step count, music control, seeing incoming text messages. The touch menu is hard to control. I can’t remove activities that I don’t use (volleyball, badminton, etc.) so there is not enough space on the menu to add more than one additional fitness activity. Syncs fine with my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This watch his huge
reviews.reviewText: They definitely lied is not 1.28 it's more like 1.39 watch face which is humongous. Such a disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very versatile and useful
reviews.reviewText: Lot of things that can do. The following are my favorites:1. Sleep tracking especially the duration of deep and light sleep2. Can change the home picture like I did3. You can see notification and read them on the watch4. Can track vital signs like O2 and pulse rate5. Count calories burned and exercise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars meet/exceed my expectations, a very good buy
reviews.reviewText: I bought the smart watch mainly because of its blood oxygen feature, needless to say how important to know the blood oxygen level during covid-19 pandemicSetup process went smoothly (download app, set up profile, pair the watch and the phone) thanks to the very informative email about the watch I received even before the watch was delivered.Basics:24/7 continuously measures heart rate, stress level, monitor sleep, count steps, calculate working distance.14 exercise modes such as indoor/outdoor walk/run/swim meet most people’s need, ball games are not included.Notification and Auto On are handy:Notifications from supported phone apps (email, instant messaging apps) are kept on the watch when they are received. It is convenient to read the short ones.Lift wrist up the watch face will be turned on briefly (adjustable), giving enough time to read info or swift to navigate to other featuresNote, Notification comes with vibration, you CANT miss the call/email/message/alarm/reminder. You can not turn the vibrate off unless notification is off. Best to set up regular do-not-disturb schedule on phone app and to easily toggle the do-not-disturb switch on the watch for other situations, On the watch You can only reject the incoming phone call you still have to use the phone to answer the call.Battery life:In my typical use the watch needs to charge once a week. (Notification is On, Auto Display is On, no Do-not-disturb schedule is set)I found setting Notification and Auto Display both off can greatly increase the battery life to last up to 3 weeksPhone app collects all measured data and exercise records and generate reports. With just $40 I get my body watched, get to know my health better, get encouraged to do more exercise to reach set goal, it is a good buy.There is a little annoying the bluetooth connection can drop sometimes although I always keep the watch and the phone nearby. It does not happen too often. When it happened, I need to try several times to get them paired again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a reliable fitness tracker, this Smart Watch is a great choice. The face is quite big and it is definitely more suited for men. It has a wide range of useful features, including a camera, music control, weather forecast, and reminders. The fitness tracking features are great and you can easily see your progress with the watch. The battery life is good, it charges quickly, which is great, and it lasts up to 7 days on a single charge. It is also very comfortable to wear and it is just what I needed. I would definitely recommend this product!
Die Uhr ist sehr gut, der Akku hält lange und sie hat auch eine schöne Größe. Bin sehr zufrieden, wirklich Top !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Basic Affordable Smartwatch | Crisp And Clear Display
reviews.reviewText: Basic Affordable Smartwatch | Crisp And Clear Display

Finalmente ho trovato uno smartwatch compatibile con xoami note 10. Ne ho provati altri qui su Amazon chiedendo il reso in quanto non funzionavano le notifiche, e ovviamente l'originale su Mi store non rispettava le mie aspettative. Ma tornando a questo smartwatch funziona benissimo, veloce, semplice, e il cinturino comodo. Sicuramente lo schermo è più grande rispetto al formato rotondo o ai 1.3", ma preferisco questo tipo in quanto posso leggere pure i messaggi e non solo le Notifiche!!!. Ottimo !!!
